name: stack-update
title: Stack Update
author: Victor Ros
description: This mod does 2 things : updates stack size for all items found and updates stats for armors, weapons and ammunitions. More information at https://github.com/VictorRos/stack-update
description_original: This mod does 2 things : updates stack size for all items found and updates stats for armors, weapons and ammunitions. More information at https://github.com/VictorRos/stack-update
